trends: There have been 579 other sightings in New York
There was one other sighting in New York on or around October 28th 2010
Summary: Ufo Sighting In Queens Ny Since OCT 28th
divs: Sighting DetailsI went Shopping at the Mall around(730Pm)and at the very top of the mall there is an outdoor garage On the Roof SO I was Really elevated, I saw lights They weren't moving I couldn't stop staring since the NYC OCT 13 I have become compelled to start looking up, So as Myself, husband, brother in law and children looked up My brother in law said it looks like there's a 4th one When out of no where Flashed on another light, Totally Freaked me out to see that, I was amazed and since then a believer, We went to the Mall and Shopped We came out about 830 or so and to my amazement they were still there so I'm trying to convince my husband there UFO and then the lights formed a vertical formations All lined up at the same time.. So that was my first sighting.. So I went back with a cam corder I have Excellent Footage. I have not shared with anyone yet. And Have continued to record I also Have Flashing lights I recorded Later in November I have had a few sightings since the first in November I have been recording..I have really good footage I would love to Share!!! With the World!!!
Object Flight Path: Stationary,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
